retweeted_status.full_text: RIA is quoting the head of the Russian-backed Donetsk People's Republic responding to the question of whether things are moving towards a war, and he says "unfortunately, yes" #Ukraine #Russia

localize.full_text: RT @michaelh992: 俄罗斯新闻社援引俄罗斯支持的顿涅茨克人民共和国领导人的话，回答了事情是否有进展的问题。
